content: We are still confident that the ramp-up in the supplies that we've been seeing from external purchases as well as the better performance of Isibonelo as well as the improvement in productivity that we've been seeing in our own CTL mines put us well on track to get to the stockpile level of 1.5 million, 1.3 million to 1.5 million by June without being any -- without having any further impact on Synfuels at the ratable level we would like to supply the Synfuel operation, which is between 107,000 and 109,000 tons on a daily basis over the period.
